name: Polar Balance
description:
Polar Balance is about a polar bear, balancing on an ever melting ice floe in an world that has become to warm for them to hunt for food.

I put the game together and created all the game mechanics during three weeks and got the great opportunity to get the visuals done by Annika Eleryd and music by Tobias Hellkvist.

(There might be a Secret hidden Somewhere in thiS Snowy game or So I've heard.)
